entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
